visa_details.description: Perfect for tourism, leisure, vacation purposes

document_requirements.name: Passport
document_requirements.description: A valid passport with minimum of 6 months validity from the date of return. Ensure at least 2 blank pages for visa stamping.

document_requirements.name: Flight Tickets
document_requirements.description: Round-trip flight tickets showing entry and exit from the country. Dummy tickets are accepted in some cases.

document_requirements.name: Hotel Booking
document_requirements.description: Confirmed hotel reservations or accommodation proof for the duration of stay.

document_requirements.name: Passport Photos
document_requirements.description: 2 recent passport-sized photographs with white background.

approval_process.title: Approval Letter Issued
approval_process.description: Visa approval notification sent via email

approval_process.title: Visa Stamping & Entry
approval_process.description: Visa stamping at embassy or on arrival

visa_details.description: Perfect for tourism with multiple visits to Vietnam

document_requirements.name: Passport
document_requirements.description: A valid passport with minimum of 6 months validity from the date of return. Ensure at least 2 blank pages for visa stamping.

document_requirements.name: Flight Tickets
document_requirements.description: Round-trip flight tickets showing entry and exit from the country. Dummy tickets are accepted in some cases.

document_requirements.name: Hotel Booking
document_requirements.description: Confirmed hotel reservations or accommodation proof for the duration of stay.

document_requirements.name: Passport Photos

visa_details.description: Ideal for business, work, meeting activities

document_requirements.name: Passport
document_requirements.description: A valid passport with minimum of 6 months validity from the date of return. Ensure at least 2 blank pages for visa stamping.

document_requirements.name: Business Invitation Letter
document_requirements.description: Official invitation letter from the host company detailing purpose, duration and financial responsibility.

document_requirements.name: Company Registration
document_requirements.description: Certificate of incorporation or business registration of your company.

document_requirements.name: Flight Tickets
document_requirements.description: Round-trip flight tickets showing entry and exit from the country.

document_requirements.name: Bank Statements
document_requirements.description: Last 3 months bank statements showing sufficient funds.

approval_process.title: Approval Letter Issued
approval_process.description: Visa approval notification sent via email

approval_process.title: Visa Stamping & Entry
approval_process.description: Visa stamping at embassy or on arrival
